price: [Nagsabi si Allāh]: “O Moises, tunay na Ako ay si Allāh, ang Makapangyarihan, ang Marunong.
arabic: يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَنَا ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yāmūsā innahu anā al-lahu al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
